wels ratehi kottasha kihipayakama siduwu karmikaranaya mishra wu aashirwada laddak se salakimata patan gena athi athara ratehi boho pradesha wala pawathi purana krushikarmika gowi jana jiwithaya noyakuth lekhakayan wisin paramadarshi kotagena atha.kese wethath john elis wiliyams (1924) wisin ingrisi saha wels bhashawen yuda kala atharathura gwynedd() jana jiwitha pilibada wadath yatharthawadi dakmak idiripath karana ladi.mema athdakim wala prakashana praja puwathpathwala palawu athara "gamiya" yana sangarawehi saha in pasuwa kadadasi bamma aakruthiya sahithawa ingrisi bhashawen "kalayehi walawa saha anekuth katha" (1989) saha "dulaba wels katha" (2000) yana mathruka yatatheda prakashayata path wiya.nidahas pranayak lesa wels prakashana kawaya salakana wiliyam shasthragnyayeku ho deshapalanyayeku nowana namudu dewana loka yuddhayen pasu asthithwawadaya waladagath simon di beuwoir samaga dadi mithrathwayak saha liyum huwamarukirim sidukala thanaththeku lesa hadinwe.
